name: Grainfruit Meat Soup
desc: A soup that consists of a mixture of meat and vegetables. When ordering Grainfruit Meat Soup in Natlan, customers can choose from a variety of different broths as well as a wide range of side dishes. The only fixed rule is this — it must contain lots of Grainfruit.

customize.name: Recipe: Grainfruit Meat Soup
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Grainfruit Meat Soup.

customize.name: Delicious Grainfruit Meat Soup
customize.desc: A soup that consists of a mixture of meat and vegetables. Any single spoonful includes soft meat, crunchy veggies, and a titillating spiciness... This cornucopia of shifting flavors decrees that you entertain seconds!

customize.name: Suspicious Grainfruit Meat Soup
customize.desc: A soup that consists of a mixture of meat and vegetables. The finished product is ashen-grey, a far cry from the bright green you had hoped for... Might this be saved by adding some more vegetables?

customize.name: Grainfruit Meat Soup
customize.desc: A soup that consists of a mixture of meat and vegetables. When ordering Grainfruit Meat Soup in Natlan, customers can choose from a variety of different broths as well as a wide range of side dishes. The only fixed rule is this — it must contain lots of Grainfruit.

customize.name: Grainfruit
customize.desc: This plant is named after the giant grains that grow along the cob.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

customize.name: Cabbage
customize.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

value.text: Restores 22% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.
